page.title: 09BURTON SALMON LEISURE 1
page.content: Girls may join Brownies or Guides in the nearby village of Monk Fryston. Boys can attend Cubs or Scouts in Brotherton or South Milford. Meetings are held once a week, but sometimes special camps are arranged. CUB CAMP by Andrew On Friday June 7 our cub pack went to Snowball Plantation near York. We helped the grown-ups put the tents up, then the whistle blew for assembly. That night we kept sneaking out of our tent and talking to Simon and Nicky. The next morning we played football before our breakfast of toast and cornflakes. We made a space-ship and came first in a competition for all the different packs. That night we sang songs and told stories around the camp-fire. The next day we went home.
